meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Sweden.
meanings.sent1: In Sweden, you can buy a lot with just one krona.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for krona at the bank.
meanings.sent3: Why did the krona go to school? To learn how to make cents!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a krona, shining brightly like gold.
meanings.sent5: The shiny krona sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A coin or note representing one krona.
meanings.sent1: I found a krona on the street and picked it up.
meanings.sent2: The vending machine only accepted krona coins.
meanings.sent3: The krona rolled off the table and into the piggy bank with a clink.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a krona, valuable and treasured by all who heard them.
meanings.sent5: She tossed the krona into the fountain, making a wish for good luck.
